definitions.definition: Any of the 613 commandments of Jewish law .
An act of kindness , a good deed.
A Jewish celebration, but particularly a clipping of bar mitzvah and/or bat mitzvah .
labels: usually only with the plural mitzvahs
definitions.label_groups: event planning industry , metonymic , usually only with the plural mitzvahs

main_definition: ( Judaism ) Any of the 613 commandments of Jewish law .
secondary_definitions: ( Judaism ) An act of kindness , a good deed.
( event planning industry , metonymic , usually only with the plural mitzvahs ) A Jewish celebration, but particularly a clipping of bar mitzvah and/or bat mitzvah .
